fields.description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: entities
fields.description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode

fields.name: disable_web_page_preview
fields.description: Optional. Disables link previews for links in the sent message

types.name: InputLocationMessageContent
types.description: Represents the content of a location message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the location in degrees

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the location in degrees

fields.name: horizontal_accuracy
fields.description: Optional. The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500

fields.name: live_period
fields.description: Optional. Period in seconds for which the location can be updated, should be between 60 and 86400.

fields.name: heading
fields.description: Optional. For live locations, a direction in which the user is moving, in degrees. Must be between 1 and 360 if specified.

fields.name: proximity_alert_radius
fields.description: Optional. For live locations, a maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. Must be between 1 and 100000 if specified.

types.name: InputVenueMessageContent
types.description: Represents the content of a venue message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the venue in degrees

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the venue in degrees

fields.name: title
fields.description: Name of the venue

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address of the venue

fields.name: foursquare_id
fields.description: Optional. Foursquare identifier of the venue, if known

fields.name: foursquare_type
fields.description: Optional. Foursquare type of the venue, if known. (For example, “arts_entertainment/default”, “arts_entertainment/aquarium” or “food/icecream”.)

fields.name: google_place_id
fields.description: Optional. Google Places identifier of the venue

fields.name: google_place_type
fields.description: Optional. Google Places type of the venue. (See supported types.)

types.name: InputContactMessageContent
types.description: Represents the content of a contact message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Contact's phone number

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: Contact's first name

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: Optional. Contact's last name

fields.name: vcard
fields.description: Optional. Additional data about the contact in the form of a vCard, 0-2048 bytes

types.name: InputInvoiceMessageContent
types.description: Represents the content of an invoice message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Product name, 1-32 characters

fields.name: description
fields.description: Product description, 1-255 characters

fields.name: payload
fields.description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use for your internal processes.

fields.name: provider_token
fields.description: Payment provider token, obtained via @BotFather

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see more on currencies

fields.name: prices
fields.description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.)

fields.name: max_tip_amount
fields.description: Optional. The maximum accepted amount for tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of US$ 1.45 pass max_tip_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0

fields.name: suggested_tip_amounts
fields.description: Optional. A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tip in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed max_tip_amount.

fields.name: provider_data
fields.description: Optional. A JSON-serialized object for data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of the required fields should be provided by the payment provider.

fields.name: photo_url
fields.description: Optional. URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service.

fields.name: photo_size
fields.description: Optional. Photo size in bytes

fields.name: photo_width
fields.description: Optional. Photo width

fields.name: photo_height
fields.description: Optional. Photo height

fields.name: need_name
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's full name to complete the order

fields.name: need_phone_number
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's phone number to complete the order

fields.name: need_email
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's email address to complete the order

fields.name: need_shipping_address
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order

fields.name: send_phone_number_to_provider
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the user's phone number should be sent to provider

fields.name: send_email_to_provider
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the user's email address should be sent to provider

fields.name: is_flexible
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the final price depends on the shipping method

types.name: ChosenInlineResult
types.description: Represents a result of an inline query that was chosen by the user and sent to their chat partner.

fields.name: result_id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the result that was chosen

fields.name: from
fields.description: The user that chose the result

fields.name: location
fields.description: Optional. Sender location, only for bots that require user location

fields.name: inline_message_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an inline keyboard attached to the message. Will be also received in callback queries and can be used to edit the message.

fields.name: query
fields.description: The query that was used to obtain the result

types.name: SentWebAppMessage
types.description: Describes an inline message sent by a Web App on behalf of a user.

fields.name: inline_message_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an inline keyboard attached to the message.

types.name: LabeledPrice
types.description: This object represents a portion of the price for goods or services.

fields.name: label
fields.description: Portion label

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Price of the product in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

types.name: Invoice
types.description: This object contains basic information about an invoice.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Product name

fields.name: description
fields.description: Product description

fields.name: start_parameter
fields.description: Unique bot deep-linking parameter that can be used to generate this invoice

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

types.name: ShippingAddress
types.description: This object represents a shipping address.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

fields.name: state
fields.description: State, if applicable

fields.name: city
fields.description: City

fields.name: street_line1
fields.description: First line for the address

fields.name: street_line2
fields.description: Second line for the address

fields.name: post_code
fields.description: Address post code

types.name: OrderInfo
types.description: This object represents information about an order.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Optional. User name

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Optional. User's phone number

fields.name: email
fields.description: Optional. User email

fields.name: shipping_address
fields.description: Optional. User shipping address

types.name: ShippingOption
types.description: This object represents one shipping option.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Shipping option identifier

fields.name: title
fields.description: Option title

fields.name: prices
fields.description: List of price portions

types.name: SuccessfulPayment
types.description: This object contains basic information about a successful payment.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot specified invoice payload

fields.name: shipping_option_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user

fields.name: order_info
fields.description: Optional. Order information provided by the user

fields.name: telegram_payment_charge_id
fields.description: Telegram payment identifier

fields.name: provider_payment_charge_id
fields.description: Provider payment identifier

types.name: ShippingQuery
types.description: This object contains information about an incoming shipping query.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique query identifier

fields.name: from
fields.description: User who sent the query

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot specified invoice payload

fields.name: shipping_address
fields.description: User specified shipping address

types.name: PreCheckoutQuery
types.description: This object contains information about an incoming pre-checkout query.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique query identifier

fields.name: from
fields.description: User who sent the query

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot specified invoice payload

fields.name: shipping_option_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user

fields.name: order_info
fields.description: Optional. Order information provided by the user

types.name: PassportData
types.description: Describes Telegram Passport data shared with the bot by the user.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Array with information about documents and other Telegram Passport elements that was shared with the bot

fields.name: credentials
fields.description: Encrypted credentials required to decrypt the data

types.name: PassportFile
types.description: This object represents a file uploaded to Telegram Passport. Currently all Telegram Passport files are in JPEG format when decrypted and don't exceed 10MB.

fields.name: file_id
fields.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file

fields.name: file_unique_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.

fields.name: file_size
fields.description: File size in bytes

fields.name: file_date
fields.description: Unix time when the file was uploaded

types.name: EncryptedPassportElement
types.description: Describes documents or other Telegram Passport elements shared with the bot by the user.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Element type. One of “personal_details”, “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “address”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”, “phone_number”, “email”.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Optional. Base64-encoded encrypted Telegram Passport element data provided by the user, available for “personal_details”, “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport” and “address” types. Can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Optional. User's verified phone number, available only for “phone_number” type

fields.name: email
fields.description: Optional. User's verified email address, available only for “email” type

fields.name: files
fields.description: Optional. Array of encrypted files with documents provided by the user, available for “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration” and “temporary_registration” types. Files can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: front_side
fields.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the front side of the document, provided by the user. Available for “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card” and “internal_passport”. The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: reverse_side
fields.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the reverse side of the document, provided by the user. Available for “driver_license” and “identity_card”. The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: selfie
fields.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the selfie of the user holding a document, provided by the user; available for “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card” and “internal_passport”. The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: translation
fields.description: Optional. Array of encrypted files with translated versions of documents provided by the user. Available if requested for “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration” and “temporary_registration” types. Files can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded element hash for using in PassportElementErrorUnspecified

types.name: EncryptedCredentials
types.description: Describes data required for decrypting and authenticating EncryptedPassportElement. See the Telegram Passport Documentation for a complete description of the data decryption and authentication processes.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Base64-encoded encrypted JSON-serialized data with unique user's payload, data hashes and secrets required for EncryptedPassportElement decryption and authentication

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded data hash for data authentication

fields.name: secret
fields.description: Base64-encoded secret, encrypted with the bot's public RSA key, required for data decryption

types.name: PassportElementErrorDataField
types.description: Represents an issue in one of the data fields that was provided by the user. The error is considered resolved when the field's value changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be data

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the error, one of “personal_details”, “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “address”

fields.name: field_name
fields.description: Name of the data field which has the error

fields.name: data_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded data hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorFrontSide
types.description: Represents an issue with the front side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with the front side of the document changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be front_side

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the front side of the document

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorReverseSide
types.description: Represents an issue with the reverse side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with reverse side of the document changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be reverse_side

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “driver_license”, “identity_card”

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the reverse side of the document

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorSelfie
types.description: Represents an issue with the selfie with a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with the selfie changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be selfie

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the selfie

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorFile
types.description: Represents an issue with a document scan. The error is considered resolved when the file with the document scan changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be file

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded file hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorFiles
types.description: Represents an issue with a list of scans. The error is considered resolved when the list of files containing the scans changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be files

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

fields.name: file_hashes
fields.description: List of base64-encoded file hashes

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorTranslationFile
types.description: Represents an issue with one of the files that constitute the translation of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be translation_file

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded file hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorTranslationFiles
types.description: Represents an issue with the translated version of a document. The error is considered resolved when a file with the document translation change.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be translation_files

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

fields.name: file_hashes
fields.description: List of base64-encoded file hashes

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: PassportElementErrorUnspecified
types.description: Represents an issue in an unspecified place. The error is considered resolved when new data is added.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be unspecified

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue

fields.name: element_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded element hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

types.name: Game
types.description: This object represents a game. Use BotFather to create and edit games, their short names will act as unique identifiers.

fields.description: Title of the game

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the game

fields.name: photo
fields.description: Photo that will be displayed in the game message in chats.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Optional. Brief description of the game or high scores included in the game message. Can be automatically edited to include current high scores for the game when the bot calls setGameScore, or manually edited using editMessageText. 0-4096 characters.

fields.name: text_entities
fields.description: Optional. Special entities that appear in text, such as usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc.

fields.name: animation
fields.description: Optional. Animation that will be displayed in the game message in chats. Upload via BotFather

types.name: CallbackGame
types.description: A placeholder, currently holds no information. Use BotFather to set up your game.

types.name: GameHighScore
types.description: This object represents one row of the high scores table for a game.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Position in high score table for the game

fields.name: user
fields.description: User

fields.name: score
fields.description: Score
